text: Kudos to the UAMS physicians recognized for their contributions to healthcare research! It's fantastic to see medical professionals being celebrated for their dedication to innovation and progress in the field. The recognition of the UAMS Hip and Knee Surgery team as among the top 1% nationwide is particularly impressive. It's a testament to the institution's commitment to excellence and the impact it has on improving patient outcomes. Let's continue to support and celebrate pioneers in healthcare research who are shaping the future of medicine!
